top.title: China and Canada announce tariffs relief after a high-stakes meeting between Carney and Xi
top.summary: Canola oil and electric cars are at the centre of the deal agreed by Mark Carney and Xi Jinping after years of strained ties.

top.title: Venezuelan Nobel Peace Prize winner presents her medal to Trump
top.summary: Trump thanked Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado, calling it "a wonderful gesture of mutual respect".

top.title: S Korea's ex-president Yoon to be jailed for five years over martial law bid
top.summary: This is the first of the verdicts in the four trials linked to Yoon's shock decree in 2024.

top.title: Use film-style age ratings to limit teens' social media, say Lib Dems
top.summary: The Conservatives want to see ban of all under-16s from social media, but the Lib Dems say that would be a "blunt instrument".

top.title: X to stop Grok AI from undressing images of real people after backlash
top.summary: Grok will no longer allow users to remove clothing from images of real people in jurisdictions where it is illegal.

top.title: No 10 welcomes reports X is addressing Grok deepfakes
top.summary: The use of the AI tool to digitally undress women has sparked a backlash as well as intervention from the government and regulator.

title.#text: Asus now claims it’s not dropping the RTX 5070 Ti amid memory shortages
Casting is dead. Long live casting!
